name: Animalriddles
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal riddles
des:
Riddles is a skill set to challenge your mind a quick and fun way to help your brain wake up in the morning.
there are set of 20 questions Have fun and try to get as many riddles right as you can.
Challenge your friends to beat your highscore.
Instructions:

(1) Open the skill by saying, "Alexa, open animal riddles”
(2) animal riddles will ask you are you ready? then say yes!
(3) animal riddles will ask you riddles 
(4) you have to answer like - is it turkey , turkey
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
